description: Esophageal stent is used to treat strictures or blockages in the esophagus.

attributes.name: Presence of Esophageal Stent
attributes.description: Whether an esophageal stent is present or not.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The status of the esophageal stent.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The esophageal stent is newly placed.

values.name: Complication
values.description: There is a complication related to the esophageal stent.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The esophageal stent has been removed.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: The location of the esophageal stent.

values.name: Upper esophagus
values.description: The esophageal stent is located in the upper esophagus.

values.name: Mid esophagus
values.description: The esophageal stent is located in the mid esophagus.

values.name: Lower esophagus
values.description: The esophageal stent is located in the lower esophagus.

values.name: Fully covered
values.description: The esophageal stent is fully covered.

values.name: Partially covered
values.description: The esophageal stent is partially covered.

attributes.name: Stent Length
attributes.description: The length of the esophageal stent.

attributes.name: Stent Diameter
attributes.description: The diameter of the esophageal stent.

attributes.name: Complication
attributes.description: The complication associated with the esophageal stent.

values.name: Mucosal erosion
values.description: There is mucosal erosion related to the esophageal stent.

values.name: Perforation
values.description: Perforation is observed related to the esophageal stent.

values.name: Migration
values.description: Migration of the esophageal stent is observed.

values.name: Impaction
values.description: Impaction of the esophageal stent is observed.
